text: NGC 167 is a spiral galaxy located approximately 172 million light-years from the Solar System in the constellation Cetus. It was discovered in 1886 by Francis Preserved Leavenworth. == See also == * Spiral galaxy * List of NGC objects (1–1000) * Cetus (constellation) == References == == External links == * * SEDS 0167 2122 Category:Cetus (constellation) Category:Spiral galaxies Category:Discoveries by Francis Leavenworth
title: NGC 167
